entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. Temperature steady near minus 1.
entry.summary: Clearing early this morning. Increasing cloudiness this afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this morning. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill minus 8 this morning and minus 3 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Saturday 28 January 2023
